Articles.Content:
how do i view assembly stats such as twr and drag? i have seen other view this on youtube but im not smart enough to figure out how to view this info

thanks

That information is provided by mods such as Mechanical Jeb, Kerbal Flight Engineer, or the like.

Here is a link containing all of those interesting mods as well as one additional, RemoteTech, but you don't have to install all of them.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mechjeb-and-remotetech-for-all/

Edited July 25, 2013 by AnalogAddict
Adding links

Most people use Mechjeb (if they want an autopilot as well), or Kerbal Engineer (if they only want data).

The most recent version of Engineer (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-kerbal-engineer-redux-v0-5/) works on .21 as far as I know.
